<span class="hljs-at_rule">@<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-string">"compass/reset"</span>;</span>
<span class="hljs-variable">$colorGreenDark</span><span class="hljs-value">: <span class="hljs-function">darken</span>(<span class="hljs-variable">$colorGreen</span>, <span class="hljs-number">10</span>);</span>
